title: Plugging in X and Y
text: We must plug in $$x=0$$ and $$y=2$$. Doing this, we get $$2=0+2$$.
speech: We must plug in  x is equal to 0  and  y, is equal to 2 . Doing this, we get  2, is equal to 0 plus 2 .

title: Determining Equality
text: $$2=0+2$$ can be simplified to $$2=2$$, which is a true statement. Thus, the point lies on the line.
speech: 2 is equal to, 0 plus 2  can be simplified to  2 is equal to 2 , which is a true statement. Thus, the point lies on the line.
